info.author: WardPearce
info.description:
## Install
- Pypi: ``pip3 install aiodactyl``
- Git: ``pip3 install git+https://github.com/WardPearce/aiodactyl.git``

[Pterodactyl API Documentation by dashflo](https://dashflo.net/docs/api/pterodactyl/v0.7/#introduction)

## Index
 - [API](#api)
 - [Example](#example)

### API
#### aiodactyl.client
``aiodactyl.client(api_key, route, session=None)``

- If you aren't passing a ``aiohttp.ClientSession`` object created within the event loop ``aiodactyl.client`` should be ran within the context of the loop.

##### aiodactyl.client(...).client(self, server_id=None)
    - list(self)
    - get(self)
    - resource(self)
    - console_command(self, command)
    - start(self)
    - stop(self)
    - restart(self)
    - kill(self)
##### aiodactyl.client(...).nodes(self, node_id=None)
    - list(self)
    - get(self)
    - create(self, **kwargs)
    - edit(self, **kwargs)
    - delete(self, **kwargs)
##### aiodactyl.client(...).nodes(self, node_id=None).allocation(self, allocation_id=None)
    - list(self)
    - create(self, **kwargs)
    - delete(self, allocation_id)
##### aiodactyl.client(...).user(self, user_id=None)
    - list(self)
    - get(self)
    - external(self, external_id)
    - create(self, **kwargs)
    - edit(self, **kwargs)
    - delete(self)
##### aiodactyl.client(...).locations(self, location_id=None)
    - list(self)
    - get(self)
    - create(self, **kwargs)
    - edit(self, **kwargs)
    - delete(self)
##### aiodactyl.client(...).servers(self, server_id=None)
    - list(self)
    - get(self)
    - get_by_external(self, external_id)
    - create(self, **kwargs)
    - update_details(self, **kwargs)
    - update_build(self, **kwargs)
    - update_parameters(self, **kwargs)
    - suspend(self)
    - reinstall(self)
    - rebuild(self)
    - delete(self)
    - force(self)
#### aiodactyl.client(...).servers(self, server_id=None).database(self, database_id=None)
    - list(self)
    - get(self)
    - create(self, **kwargs)
    - password_reset(self)
    - delete(self)
#### aiodactyl.client(...).nests(self, nest_id=None)
    - list(self)
    - get(self)
    - eggs(self)
    - egg(self, egg_id)

### Example
```py
import aiodactyl
import asyncio

async def example(loop):
    # Route should be the link to your pterodactyl panel with /api added to the end.
    aiodactyl_client = aiodactyl.client(api_key="*******", route="https://example.com/api")

    print(await aiodactyl_client.nodes().list())

    await aiodactyl_client.session.close()

loop = asyncio.get_event_loop()
loop.run_until_complete(example(loop))
loop.close()
```

import aiodactyl
import asyncio

async def example(loop):
